ygData.subject: building on Mac OS X
ygData.msgSnippet: I tried building cantera on OS X, and found that the blas and lapack libs are not built.  In cantera-1.6.0/config/configure, there is a statement that

I tried building cantera on OS X, and found that the blas and lapack
libs are not built.  In cantera-1.6.0/config/configure, there is a
statement that effectively prevents lapack and blas from being build
on OS X.

If I remove this statement, the blas libraries build, but there are
undefined symbols in them:

_dgemv_
_dgemm_
_dtrsm_
_xerbla_
_dswap_
_lsame_
_dger_
_dscal_
_idamax_
_s_cmp
_s_copy
_dtrmm_
_s_cat
_dtrmv_
_s_paus

Any thoughts?

James
